item.title: Teaching activities
item.description: Teaching activities Analyse Numérique Algorithmique Statistics Introduction to Machine Learning Graph Kernels

Research Activities An up to date list of publications can be found at Google Scholar. All publications are available for download on HAL. If you still need any pdf, please drop a mail. Most of papers have been implemented. Please check my github. Last papers A paper on a new pooling scheme for graph neural network based on maximal independant vertex set. To be presented at S+SSPR 2022.
